original_text: Do you lend things only to people that will give your things back to you? God will not praise you for doing that! Even bad people lend things to other people when they believe that they will get them back again.
korean_text: 너희가 받기를 바라고 사람들에게 꾸어 주면 칭찬 받을 것이 무엇이냐 죄인들도 그만큼 받고자 하여 죄인에게 꾸어 주느니라

sentences.original_text: Do you lend things only to people
that will give your things back to you?
Even bad people lend things to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 악한 사람들조차 다른 사람들에게 물건을 빌려준다

sentences.original_text: that they will get them back again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들을 다시 돌려받을 수 있을 것이라고 믿을 때이다.
